title: Demon Slayer: Infinity Castle
producer: Akifumi Fujio, Masanori Miyake, Yma Takahashi
castMembers: Natsuki Hanae, Akari Kit, Hiro Shimono, Saori Hayami
synopsis: The Demon Slayer Corps are drawn into the Infinity Castle, where Tanjiro and the Hashira battle powerful Upper Rank demons in a final confrontation against Muzan Kibutsuji.
reviews: Visually stunning and emotionally powerful — a thrilling continuation for fans.

title: Weapons
castMembers: Pedro Pascal, Julia Garner, Josh Brolin
synopsis: An interrelated horror epic exploring human violence and terror.

title: The Conjuring
castMembers: Vera Farmiga, Patrick Wilson, Ron Livingston
synopsis: Paranormal investigators Ed and Lorraine Warren work to help a family terrorized by a dark presence.
reviews: One of the scariest modern horror movies.

title: The Strangers
synopsis: A couple staying in an isolated vacation home are terrorized by masked intruders.

title: Fantastic Four
castMembers: Pedro Pascal, Vanessa Kirby, Joseph Quinn, Ebon Moss-Bachrach
synopsis: Marvel’s first family of superheroes face cosmic threats together.
reviews: Fans are excited to see the team join the MCU.
